name: SSF14
title: Site-Specific Factor 14
subtitle: Multiple Carcinomas
notes: **Note:**  Code a history of two or more carcinomas as documented by the physician or as found in the medical record or registry database.  Include in the identification of "carcinoma" any tumor with a histology code between 8010 and 8589, excluding all carcinomas of skin coded to site C440-C449.
rows: No history of two or more carcinomas excluding skin carcinoma
History of two or more carcinomas excluding skin carcinoma
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
